blogPost.excerpt: TextOptimizer is simple, fast, and efficient so that you can write well-optimized content in less than 10 minutes. 70% of our optimized pages ranked higher within 5 weeks.
blogPost.body: TextOptimizer is simple, fast, and efficient so that you can write well-optimized content in less than 10 minutes. 70% of our optimized pages ranked higher within 5 weeks.
blogPost.title: Text Optimizer - Text optimization tool to rank higher in search engines
blogPost.author: Sanjay Joshi

localize.description: TextOptimizer是简单、快速、高效的，所以你可以在10分钟内写出优化好的内容。我们70%的优化页面在5周内排名较高。
localize.tagline: 文字优化工具，在搜索引擎中排名更高

localize.description: TextOptimizer是簡單、快速、高效的，所以你可以在10分鐘內寫出優化好的內容。我們70%的優化頁面在5周內排名較高。
localize.tagline: 文字優化工具，在搜索引擎中排名更高

previous.excerpt: Alice is an AI camera that works with your smartphone to shoot and share better content in a fraction of the time. Capture crystal clear 4K footage straight out of camera — and share it instantly to your followers.
previous.title: Alice Camera - An AI camera for content creators

localize.description: 爱丽丝是一款人工智能相机，它可以与智能手机配合使用，在极短的时间内拍摄并分享更好的内容。直接从相机中捕捉晶莹剔透的4K画面--并即时分享给您的追随者。
localize.tagline: 为内容创作者打造的AI相机

localize.description: 愛麗絲是一款人工智能相機，它可以與智能手機配合使用，在極短的時間內拍攝並分享更好的內容。直接從相機中捕捉晶瑩剔透的4K畫面--並即時分享給您的追隨者。
localize.tagline: 爲內容創作者打造的AI相機

next.excerpt: MyEdu is an edu-tech firm that provides communication software solutions and apps for assisting school teachers, parents, as well as students. MyEdu's apps also help teachers in managing day-to-day activities in the most efficient way possible.
next.title: MyEdu - School management software

localize.description: MyEdu是一家教育科技公司，提供通讯软件解决方案和应用程序，以协助学校教师、家长以及学生。MyEdu的应用程序也帮助教师以最有效的方式管理日常活动。
MyEdu是一家教育科技公司，提供通訊軟件解決方案和應用程序，以協助學校教師、家長以及學生。MyEdu的應用程序也幫助教師以最有效的方式管理日常活動。
